unicode

Supplementary glyphs

Can be added as double encoded character(s):
uni0022 (QUOTATION MARK) is present, but 'uni2033' is missing.
uni0027 (APOSTROPHE) is present, but 'uni2032' is missing.

Check against Base Glyph Advance Width

Check against Base Glyph Advance Width

Pass

This is a TrueType font. This test is only for CFF.

uni200A

Advance width of 'hairspace' (uni200A) should be smaller than the width of space (uni0020).

Can not check, because no uni200A in this font.

Info

Chivo Light Italic (Chivo-LightItalic.ttf)

cmap

uni2004

Advance width of 'THREE-PER-EM SPACE' (uni2004) should be 1/3 of em-square.

Can not check, because no uni2004 in this font.

Info

cmap

uni2005

Advance width of 'FOUR-PER-EM SPACE' (uni2005) should be 1/4 of em-square.

Can not check, because no uni2005 in this font.

Info

cmap

uni2006

Advance width of 'SIX-PER-EM SPACE' (uni2006) should be 1/6 of em-square.

Can not check, because no uni2006 in this font.

Info

Chivo Light Italic (Chivo-LightItalic.ttf)

cmap

uni2002

Advance width of 'EN SPACE' (uni2002) should be 50%% of em-square.

Can not check, because no uni2002 in this font.

Info

Chivo Light Italic (Chivo-LightItalic.ttf)

cmap

uni2003

Advance width of 'EM SPACE' (uni2003) should be equal to UPM.

Can not check, because no uni2003 in this font.

Info

Chivo Light Italic (Chivo-LightItalic.ttf)

cmap

uni2008

Advance width of 'PUNCTUATION SPACE' (uni2008) should be equal to the 'period' advance width.

Can not check, because no uni2008 in this font.

Pass

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Check double NULL

Font only has one NULL: 'NULL'

Warning

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

glyf

Contours

.notdef should be TOFU.

.notdef has 5 contours. It looks like it is a TOFU with a cross.

Info

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

cmap

uni200B

Check ZERO WIDTH SPACE

Missing uni200B in cmap table.

Error

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

cmap

FEFF

ZERO WIDTH NO-BREAK SPACE: Missing FEFF in cmap table.

Required for Monotype library. Please add unicode FEFF. Custom work refer to spec.

Pass

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

cmap

00AD

Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table.

Soft hyphen is often used in web and in professional print publishing software like Adobe InDesign.

Pass

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

hmtx

Index 3 and 270

Advance width of nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) should match the space (uni0020) width.

OK: Advance width nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) does match the space (uni0020) width:
192 = 192

Info

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Info

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Info

Chivo Light Regular (Chivo-Light.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Info

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

This is not a CFF font. Skipped this check.

First Four Characters

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

post

Index 0

PostScript name should be ".notdef".

OK: Index 0 = ".notdef".

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

hmtx

Index 0

'.notdef' advance width should not be 0.

OK: '.notdef' advance width is 500.

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

post

Index 1

PostScript name should be one of the names:
".null"
"null"
"NULL".

OK: Index 1 = "NULL".

Pass

glyf

Index 1

'NULL' shoiuld have no contours.

'NULL' has 0 contours.

Pass

hmtx

Index 1

'NULL' should have an advance width of 0.

OK: 'NULL' has an advance width of 0.

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

post

Index 2

PostScript name should be one of the names:
"nonmarkingreturn"
"CR".

OK: Index 2 = "nonmarkingreturn".

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

glyf

Index 2

'nonmarkingreturn' should have no contours.

OK: 'nonmarkingreturn' has 0 contours.

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

hmtx

Index 2

Advance width of 'nonmarkingreturn' should match the space width.

OK: 'nonmarkingreturn' advance width does match the space width:
220 = 220

Pass

OK: Index 3 = "space".

OK: 'space' has 0 contours.

OK: 'space' has 0 contours.

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

table version 4.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

OK: 'OS/2' table version is: 4.

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the sTypo metrics and not usWin metrics the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be True.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag is True.

Error

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

WWS

If no NID 21 and 22, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True but is False.

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Installable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Info

fsType

embedding level: Embedding Level = Installable Embedding
no subsetting flag: False
bitmap embedding only flag: False

Pass

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

OS/2

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Installable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Chivo Light Regular (Chivo-Light.ttf)

static font

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 The Chivo Project Authors (omnibus.type@gmail.com)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Mac NID 6

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Chivo-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Chivo-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Chivo is a trademark of Omnibus-Type.'
but what do think about this
'Chivo is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Omnibus-Type', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.omnibus-type.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

name

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.omnibus-type.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Omnibus-Type' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 The Chivo Project Authors (omnibus.type@gmail.com)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

MS NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '10'
'Chivo Bold'

Warning

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

Reserved word 'Bold' used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications. Style linking and/or font embedding for MS Word might not work.

Chivo Bold

Warning

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

'Bold' at the end of NID 1 causes cross platfrom issues.

It looks like you want to have a 'stand-alone'-font without any style linking, because NID 2 is 'Regular' and NID 1 has the word 'Bold' at the end 'Chivo Bold'.
This cause issues in PowerPoint, when you create a PowerPoint presentation on your Mac and you want to open it on a Windows machine. The font might be displayed twice in the font selection menu of MS PowerPoint for Windows + cross platform compatiblity does not work. You may want to consider to replace 'Bold' by 'Bd'. It should work then. (Customer A&E May 2019)

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Pass

MS NID 5

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '10'
'Chivo-Bold'

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Chivo-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Chivo-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:

but what do think about this
'Chivo is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Omnibus-Type', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Chivo' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Bold' = NID 1 'Chivo Bold'.

Pass

It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

name

OK: NID 1 length is '5'
'Chivo'

Mac NID 1

'Chivo'

Chivo Light Regular (Chivo-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '11'
'Chivo-Light'

Pass

Chivo Light Regular (Chivo-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Chivo-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Chivo Light Regular (Chivo-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Chivo-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Chivo Light Regular (Chivo-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Chivo Light Regular (Chivo-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Chivo is a trademark of Omnibus-Type.'
but what do think about this
'Chivo is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Chivo Light Regular (Chivo-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Omnibus-Type', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Chivo Light Regular (Chivo-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.omnibus-type.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Chivo Light Regular (Chivo-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.omnibus-type.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Chivo Light Regular (Chivo-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Omnibus-Type' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Chivo Light Regular (Chivo-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 The Chivo Project Authors (omnibus.type@gmail.com)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Chivo Light Regular (Chivo-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Chivo Light Regular (Chivo-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Chivo' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light' = NID 1 'Chivo Light'.

Pass

Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Pass

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 The Chivo Project Authors (omnibus.type@gmail.com)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Chivo Regular (Chivo-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Chivo Regular (Chivo-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Xtra, Ex, Extra, Demi, Dm, X, Sm, Semi, Ultra'

Pass

Chivo Regular (Chivo-Regular.ttf)

Mac NID 6

Pass

Chivo Regular (Chivo-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Chivo-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Chivo Regular (Chivo-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Chivo-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Chivo Regular (Chivo-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Chivo Regular (Chivo-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Chivo Regular (Chivo-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Chivo Regular (Chivo-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Chivo is a trademark of Omnibus-Type.'
but what do think about this
'Chivo is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Chivo Regular (Chivo-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Omnibus-Type', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Chivo Regular (Chivo-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.omnibus-type.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Chivo Regular (Chivo-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.omnibus-type.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Chivo Regular (Chivo-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Omnibus-Type' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

name

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Chivo Bold Italic (Chivo-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Chivo-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Chivo Bold Italic (Chivo-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Chivo-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Chivo Bold Italic (Chivo-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Chivo Bold Italic (Chivo-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Omnibus-Type' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Chivo Bold Italic (Chivo-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Chivo' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Bold Italic' = NID 1 'Chivo Bold' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Chivo Bold Italic (Chivo-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Chivo Bold Italic (Chivo-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright 2016 The Chivo Project Authors (omnibus.type@gmail.com)'
MS is: 'Copyright 2016 The Chivo Project Authors (omnibus.type@gmail.com)'

Error

Chivo Bold Italic (Chivo-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 1

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Chivo'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Chivo Bold'

Error

Chivo Bold Italic (Chivo-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 2

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Bold Italic'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Italic'

Pass

Chivo Italic (Chivo-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '12'
'Chivo-Italic'

Pass

Chivo Italic (Chivo-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Chivo-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Chivo Italic (Chivo-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Chivo-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Chivo Italic (Chivo-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Error

Chivo Italic (Chivo-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Chivo is a trademark of Omnibus-Type.'
but what do think about this
'Chivo is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Chivo Italic (Chivo-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Omnibus-Type', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Chivo Italic (Chivo-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.omnibus-type.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Chivo Italic (Chivo-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.omnibus-type.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Chivo Italic (Chivo-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Omnibus-Type' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Chivo Italic (Chivo-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Chivo Italic (Chivo-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '12'
'Chivo-Italic'

Pass

Chivo Italic (Chivo-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Chivo-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Chivo Italic (Chivo-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Chivo-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Chivo Italic (Chivo-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Chivo Italic (Chivo-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Chivo is a trademark of Omnibus-Type.'
but what do think about this
'Chivo is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Chivo Italic (Chivo-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Omnibus-Type', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Chivo Italic (Chivo-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.omnibus-type.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Chivo Italic (Chivo-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.omnibus-type.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Chivo Italic (Chivo-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Omnibus-Type' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Chivo Italic (Chivo-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Chivo-LightItalic', Everything looks good.

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6 contains correct campel case: 'LightItalic'

Mac NID 7

but what do think about this

name

Error

Chivo Light Italic (Chivo-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Omnibus-Type' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Chivo Light Italic (Chivo-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Chivo Light Italic (Chivo-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 The Chivo Project Authors (omnibus.type@gmail.com)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

'Chivo Light'

MS NID 4

NID 4 'Chivo Light Italic' = NID 1 'Chivo Light' + 'space' + NID 2 'Italic'

Chivo Light Italic (Chivo-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '17'
'Chivo-LightItalic'

Pass

Chivo Light Italic (Chivo-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Chivo-LightItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Chivo Light Italic (Chivo-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Chivo-LightItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Chivo Light Italic (Chivo-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Chivo Light Italic (Chivo-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Chivo' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light Italic' = NID 1 'Chivo Light' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Windows NID 10 (MS/BMP/English (U.S.))

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Windows NID 10, Description' (MS/BMP/English (U.S.))

Description NID 10 (MS/BMP/English (U.S.)) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Pass

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 The Chivo Project Authors (omnibus.type@gmail.com)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

NID 6 length is '11'

Pass

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Chivo-Black', Everything looks good.

Pass

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Chivo-Black', Everything looks good.

Pass

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Chivo is a trademark of Omnibus-Type.'
but what do think about this
'Chivo is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Omnibus-Type', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.omnibus-type.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Omnibus-Type' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Chivo' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Black' = NID 1 'Chivo Black'.

Pass

Chivo Black Regular (Chivo-Black.ttf)

name

Unique Font Identifier is present.

Pass

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 The Chivo Project Authors (omnibus.type@gmail.com)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

OK: NID 1 length is '5'
'Chivo'

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Xtra, Ex, Extra, Demi, Dm, X, Sm, Semi, Ultra'

Pass

Width Names Family Name NID1

'Chivo'

'Regular'
'Italic'

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Chivo Black Italic' = NID 1 'Chivo' + 'space' + NID 2 'Black Italic'

Pass

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

Pass

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '17'
'Chivo-BlackItalic'

Pass

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Chivo-BlackItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Chivo-BlackItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6 contains correct campel case: 'BlackItalic'

Error

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Chivo is a trademark of Omnibus-Type.'
but what do think about this
'Chivo is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Omnibus-Type', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.omnibus-type.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.omnibus-type.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Omnibus-Type' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Omnibus-Type' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Chivo' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Black Italic' = NID 1 'Chivo Black' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

MS is: 'Copyright 2016 The Chivo Project Authors (omnibus.type@gmail.com)'

Pass

post

underline position and thickness

underlinePosition should be a negative and underlineThickness not 0 or negative.

underlinePosition is '-75'.
underlineThicknes is '50'.

Pass

underlineThicknes is '50'.

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

The font has GPOS kerning.

Info

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.

Font has no 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.

Info

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

kern/GPOS

kern

'kern' table and 'GPOS' kerning.

Font has GPOS kerning and no 'kern' table.
Verify with the spec or PM what is required.

Pass

Vertical Metrics

Vertical Metrics

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

OS/2 and head

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1190) match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (1000).

Info

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

hhea

Vertical Metrics

Pull hhea Metrics

hhea.ascent: 940
hhea.descent: -250
hhea.lineGap: 0

Info

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

Vertical Metrics

Pull OS/2 sTypo Metrics

OS2.sTypoAscender: 940
OS2.sTypoDescender: -250
OS2.sTypoLineGap: 0

Info

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

Vertical Metrics

Pull OS/2 usWin Metrics

OS2.usWinAscent: 937
OS2.usWinDescent: 250

Info

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

xAvgCharWidth

Get 'OS/2' xAvgCharWidth.

xAvgCharWidth = 562.

Info

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

hhea

advanceWidthMax

Get advanceWidthMax.

advanceWidthMax = 1080.

Info

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

hhea

xMin, yMin, xMax, yMax

Get xMin, yMin, xMax, yMax.

xMin: -212
yMin: -250
xMax: 1030
yMax: 931

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

sTypoAscender

Vertical Metrics 'sTypoAscender' shouldn't be negative.

sTypoAscender = '940'.

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

sTypoDescender

Vertical Metrics 'sTypoDescender' should be negative.

sTypoDescender = '-250'.

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

sTypoLineGap

Vertical Metrics 'sTypoLineGap' shouldn't be negative.

sTypoLineGap = '0'.

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

usWinAscent

Vertical Metrics 'usWinAscent' shouldn't be negative.

usWinAscent = '937'.

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

usWinDescent

Vertical Metrics 'usWinDescent' shouldn't be negative.

usWinDescent = '250'.

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

hhea

ascent

Vertical Metrics 'ascent' shouldn't be negative.

ascent = '940'.

Pass

descent = '-250'.

Chivo Light Regular (Chivo-Light.ttf)

OS/2 and head

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1190) match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (1000).

gasp Table

gasp Table

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

gasp

Version

gasp table verison should be 1.

Verison = 1

Info

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

gasp

Default

Pull gasp table Default.

Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

gasp

Default

Check gasp table Default.

gasp table default is:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True
and should be:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

gasp

Default

Pull gasp table Default.

Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Chivo Black Italic (Chivo-BlackItalic.ttf)

gasp

Default

Check gasp table Default.

gasp table default is:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True
and should be:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

PostScript names

PostScript names

Pass

Chivo Bold Regular (Chivo-Bold.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Chivo Light Regular (Chivo-Light.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Every PostScript name is fine.
